      • bulkUpdate

        @PutMapping(value="validationStamps/{validationStampId}/bulk")
public Ack bulkUpdate(@PathVariable
                                                                                     ID validationStampId)
        Bulk update of all validation stamps in other projects/branches and in predefined validation stamps, following the model designed by the validation stamp ID.
        Parameters:
        validationStampId - ID of the validation stamp model
        Returns:
        Result of the update
